TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConsoleKeyInfo extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Describes the console key that was pressed, including the character represented by the console key and the state of the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys.

span.span: Describes the console key that was pressed, including the character represented by the console key and the state of the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型不应由用户来创建。The type is not intended to be created by users. 相反，返回到调用的响应中的用户方法。Instead, it is returned to the user in response to calling the method. 对象描述常量和 Unicode 字符，如果有的话，对应于按下的控制台键。The object describes the constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key. 对象还中描述的按位组合值，是否一个或多个 SHIFT、 ALT 和 CTRL 修改键的同时按下控制台键。The object also describes, in a bitwise combination of values, whether one or more SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用在读取操作中的对象。The following example demonstrates using a object in a read operation. [!code-cpp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CPP/rk.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/CS/rk.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.readkey1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.readkey1/VB/rk.vb#1)]

param.name: alt

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure using the specified character, console key, and modifier keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型不是由用户来创建。This type is not intended to be created by users. 相反，返回到调用的响应中的用户方法。Instead, it is returned to the user in response to calling the method. 类型未指定左或向右的 SHIFT、 alt 键或 CTRL 修改键是否曾按下。The type does not specify whether the left or right SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL modifier key was pressed.

exception.span: The numeric value of the parameter is less than 0 or greater than 255.

span.span: The numeric value of the parameter is less than 0 or greater than 255.

summary.span: Gets the Unicode character represented by the current object.

span.span: Gets the Unicode character represented by the current object.

value.span: 对应于由当前的控制台键的对象对象。

span.span: An object that corresponds to the console key represented by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按的键不映射到 Unicode 字符 (例如，如果用户按下**F1**密钥或**主页**密钥) 的值属性是 \U0000。If the key pressed does not map to a Unicode character (for example, if the user presses the **F1** key or the **Home** key), the value of the property is \U0000. ## Examples 下面的示例使用要添加用户的字符输入转换为字符串属性。The following example uses the property to add the characters input by the user into a string. 该示例将忽略特殊键以外**ENTER**， **ESC**，和**退格符**。The example ignores special keys other than **ENTER**, **ESC**, and **BACKSPACE**. [!code-csharp[System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolekeyinfo.keychar/cs/keychar1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.consolekeyinfo.keychar/vb/keychar1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets a bitwise combination of values that specifies one or more modifier keys pressed simultaneously with the console key.

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
There is no default value.
